content: to end 48 sts round 9 single_crochet into back loop of each st the tentacles will be attached to the front loops of this round round 10 single_crochet in each st repeat round 10 an additional 11 times or until body measures 8 inches from front loops of round 9 round 30 ch1 single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts move marker to this st single_crochet in each of next 7 sts ch12 row 22 rs single_crochet in each of next 16 sts turn this will be the hanging loop so feel free to row 23 ws ch1 single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts single_crochet in chain more or fewer for your desired loop each of next 27 sts single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts turn length single_crochet in each of next 6 sts single_crochet decrease in next 29 sts 2 sts do not turn 15 sts do not count row 24 ch1 single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts single_crochet in each hanging loop chain of next 25 sts single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts turn 27 round 31 single_crochet in first st of previous round with sts the marker in it single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts single_crochet in row 25 ch1 single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts single_crochet in each following st twice single_crochet decrease in next st and first st of next 23 sts single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts turn 25 after hanging loop chain single_crochet in next st single_crochet decrease sts in following 2 sts twice 10 sts row 26 ch1 single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts single_crochet in each round 32 single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts 5 times 5 of next 21 sts single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts turn 23 sts sts cut yarn and tie off using tapestry needle row 27 ch1 single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts single_crochet in each thread tail in and out of final sts and cinch of next 19 sts single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts turn 21 closed sts row 28 ch1 single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts single_crochet in each join yarn at top point of mouth opening of next 17 sts single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts turn 19 work 13 single_crochet down first side of mouth 17 single_crochet sts along bottom edge of mouth 12 single_crochet up second row 29 ch1 single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts single_crochet in each side of mouth slip st in first st of this round of next 15 sts single_crochet decrease in next 2 sts turn 17 cut yarn and tie off weave in ends sts © 2018 carissa browning 3 knit body co 2 sts slide to opposite end of needle and round 15 k to end place marker for beginning of round round 1 kfb twice 4 sts repeat round 15 an additional 33 times or redistribute sts to use magic loop method until until body measures 8 inches from purl ridge of full circumference is achieved round 14 round 2 kfb 4 times 8
